00016     LHEPrimaryGenerator::LHEPrimaryGenerator(LHEReader* theReader) :
00017             reader_(theReader) {

00020     LHEPrimaryGenerator::~LHEPrimaryGenerator() {

00024     void LHEPrimaryGenerator::GeneratePrimaryVertex(G4Event* anEvent) {
00025 
00026         LHEEvent* lheEvent = reader_->readNextEvent();
00027 
00028         if (lheEvent != NULL) {
00029 
00030             G4PrimaryVertex* vertex = new G4PrimaryVertex();
00031             vertex->SetPosition(0, 0, 0);
00032             vertex->SetWeight(lheEvent->getXWGTUP());
00033 
00034             std::map<LHEParticle*, G4PrimaryParticle*> particleMap;
00035 
00036             int particleIndex = 0;
00037             const std::vector<LHEParticle*>& particles = lheEvent->getParticles();
00038             for (std::vector<LHEParticle*>::const_iterator it = particles.begin(); it != particles.end(); it++) {
00039 
00040                 LHEParticle* particle = (*it);
00041 
00042                 if (particle->getISTUP() > 0) {
00043 
00044                     G4PrimaryParticle* primary = new G4PrimaryParticle();
00045                     if (particle->getIDUP() == -623) { /* Tungsten ion */
00046                         G4ParticleDefinition* tungstenIonDef = G4IonTable::GetIonTable()->GetIon(74, 184, 0.);
00047                         if (tungstenIonDef != NULL) {
00048                             primary->SetParticleDefinition(tungstenIonDef);
00049                         } else {
00050                             G4Exception("LHEPrimaryGenerator::GeneratePrimaryVertex", "EventGenerationError", FatalException, "Failed to find particle definition for W ion.");
00051                         }
00052                     } else {
00053                         primary->SetPDGcode(particle->getIDUP());
00054                     }
00055 
00056                     primary->SetMomentum(particle->getPUP(0) * GeV, particle->getPUP(1) * GeV, particle->getPUP(2) * GeV);
00057                     primary->SetMass(particle->getPUP(4) * GeV);
00058                     primary->SetProperTime(particle->getVTIMUP() * nanosecond);
00059 
00060                     UserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = new UserPrimaryParticleInformation();
00061                     primaryInfo->setHepEvtStatus(particle->getISTUP());
00062                     primary->SetUserInformation(primaryInfo);
00063 
00064                     particleMap[particle] = primary;
00065 
00066                     /*
00067                      * Assign primary as daughter but only if the mother is not a DOC particle.
00068                      */
00069                     if (particle->getMother(0) != NULL && particle->getMother(0)->getISTUP() > 0) {
00070                         G4PrimaryParticle* primaryMom = particleMap[particle->getMother(0)];
00071                         if (primaryMom != NULL) {
00072                             primaryMom->SetDaughter(primary);
00073                         }
00074                     } else {
00075                         vertex->SetPrimary(primary);
00076                     }
00077 
00078                     primary->Print();
00079 
00080                 } else {
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 std::cout << std::endl;
00084 
00085                 ++particleIndex;
00086             }
00087 
00088             anEvent->AddPrimaryVertex(vertex);
00089 
00090         } else {
00091             std::cout << "[ LHEPrimaryGenerator ] : Ran out of input events so run will be aborted!" << std::endl;
00092             G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortRun(true);
00093             anEvent->SetEventAborted();
00094         }
00095 
00096         delete lheEvent;
00097     }
00098 
00099 }
